      • getSelectableBaseProjectIDs

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getSelectableBaseProjectIDs(TPersonBean personBean)
        In some cases the selectable projects are limited by extra rights
        Parameters:
        personBean -
        Returns:
        returns the base projects having the implicit right. The project/release picker adds the subprojects/subreleases to this base projects
